title: 11/26/21 DPS Hour 3
itunes:title: 11/26/21 DPS Hour 3
description:
Jason McIntyre and Rob Parker, in for Dan, react to the Cowboys losing to the Raiders and debate if Dak Prescott can still lead this team to playoff success. The guys debate Steph Curry's legacy as a late-game shooter. USA Today Sports Reporter Tyler Dragon joins the guys to explain why he believes Justin Herbert, not Matt Stafford, is the best quarterback in Los Angeles. Plus, Jason and Rob make their picks for the biggest games of this weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
